attributes.action: rebate a % of income tax (to be debated) to those not claiming any benifit over a period of time (also to be debated)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition's aim is to reduce the number of people claiming benifits by giving an insentive to find work and stay in employment. It is also fairer on the already permanently employed people in the UK who pay to support others.
This is not aimed at persecuting disabled and genuine claimants who are looking for work, but to reward those who reject govenment help where not required, basically the hard working people of our society who do not claim anything while contributing a huge percentage of thier earnings to support others.
